title: The way to peace amongst all Protestants: being a letter of reconciliation sent by Bp. Ridley to Bp. Hooper, with some observations upon it. Licensed, July the 14. 1688.
author: Johnson, Samuel, 1649-1703.
notes: The bulk of the text is by Samuel Johnson.
Sometimes also attributed to Nicholas Ridley.
Identified as Wing R1453 on UMI microfilm (Early English books, 1641-1700) reel 508.
Reproductions of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
